title: Kitty and the bagman
creator_credit: Donald Crombie, Anthony Buckley and Forest Home Films
brief_description: A drama about two of Sydney’s best known crime queens - Kitty O’Rourke and Big Lil - who created havoc in the underworld of the 1920’s. Together these two women ran the sly grog shops, gambling houses, prostitution and hold up merchants during the seamier side of 1920’s life in Australia. Stars Liddy Clark and John Stanton.
